Package com.taxi.ui

Class Summary
Class Description
CallDialog The Class CallDialog creates the dialog fragment for Call section of this application.
LeftNavAdapter The Adapter class for the ListView displayed in the left navigation drawer.
MainFragment The Class MainFragment is the base fragment that shows the Google Map.
RightNavAdapter The Adapter class for the ListView displayed in the left navigation drawer.
SearchDialog The Class SearchDialog creates the dialog fragment for Search section of this application.
